title: hey riot why did u ban me

replies.body:
Hey, 

Just to jump in and provide some context, below are your scores, summoner spells and items in the 3 games. It looks like you were banned for intentional feeding. I think at the time there was a bug where sometimes the instant feedback system would send through chat logs for intentional feeding bans which leads to the weird chat logs. behaviour like this is not acceptable in our game. I know this is from April last year, but please do think of your fellow players. Do not ruin other peoples experience and look to instead be a leader and sportsmanlike force in our community =D.

All of these games were in Ranked.

Game 1
http://i.imgur.com/VGkKsO4.png

Game 2
http://i.imgur.com/MjIjw59.png

Game 3
http://i.imgur.com/lmxeHcu.png

P.S. You should definitely change that summoner name soon =P
Nice burn there Woody :D More effective than a Teemo with smite and a sightstone :D
Rofl! Automated system at it's best!

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:20:13.193+0000)
>
> Rofl! Automated system at it's best!

You were just complaining that automated system simply doesn't do anything.....

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:33:27.739+0000)
>
> You were just complaining that automated system simply doesn't do anything.....

And what a prime example to show how "good" it really works.

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:41:53.684+0000)
>
> And what a prime example to show how "good" it really works.

We haven't even verified that whether or not it's even true yet, you do know how easy it is to edit and falsify shit these days right?

And even if it is indeed a mess-up by the system, don't tell me that it somehow suddenly invalidates automated system entirely with this 1 example or 2. Because the alternatives, which would be community-driven judiciary system and in-house human evaluations (which the latter is impossible to be applied to all matches considering the amount of matches per day), are not of 100 percent accuracy or reliability either. There is a reason why reasoning along the lines of "Falsus in uno, falsus in omnibus (false in one thing, false in everything)" while is still employed in some legal systems, it is widely considered to be a logical/rational fallacy. Things are not that simple.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:49:03.062+0000)
>
> We haven't even verified that whether or not it's even true yet, you do know how easy it is to edit and falsify shit these days right?
> 
> And even if it is indeed a mess-up by the system, don't tell me that it somehow suddenly invalidates automated system entirely with this 1 example or 2. Because the alternatives, which would be community-driven judiciary system and in-house human evaluations, are not of 100 percent accuracy or reliability either. There is a reason why "Falsus in uno, falsus in omnibus (false in one thing, false in everything)" while is still employed in some legal systems, it is widely considered to be a logical/rational fallacy. Things are not that simple.

So let's just continue with how things are, do nothing and we'll be one happy little toxic community.

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:54:33.761+0000)
>
> So let's just continue with how things are, do nothing and we'll be one happy little toxic community.

I already pointed out in another thread the League's Tribunal and CS:GO's community peer review haven't stopped the their communities from being toxic, the problem obviously does not lie in whether or not the methodology is automated or not, while that's what you seem to be pushing which is imho, false.

But hey.
its real dunno how u want me 2 prove it though xd

> [{quoted}](name=YourAutism,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:52:36.412+0000)
>
> its real dunno how u want me 2 prove it though xd

Does it say why you're banned on there? Pretty sure they should put a tag on there that at least signifies what kind of category of offences you are banned for.

If not you could always wait for a hopeful red response here, or you could always try support ticket. Assuming you aren't banned for cheating the game or something like that, you shouldn't be met with just bot copy-paste responses (though from my experience with their support, their first response tend to be very bot-like for some reason, it's usually the second or third response in the same conversation chain where they actually resemble a human typing to you).
was something along the lines of verbal abuse but dont know since the ban is already over only showed up because it was the first time i logged in  since being banned

> [{quoted}](name=YourAutism,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ipatURE0,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:52:36.412+0000)
>
> its real dunno how u want me 2 prove it though xd

Screenshot the whole ticket????
my ban was over nearly a year ago thank u though
If I had to guess, I'd say it's the summoner name.

He'd probably just get a temp name for that, I'd say more likely (assuming it's unedited) it was something like what happened here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/sU5wOfFJ-proof-that-the-automated-system-is-broken?comment=0029
This is fuckign so stupid, this better not be a thing.

It could be a legit complaint, but it could also be a deliberate slander.

I'll leave it to Riot to sort out.
